a.content:
Pick 8 from 12 chairs.

{12 \choose 8}

Multiply the number of ways for 8 people to sit on 8 chairs.

{12 \choose 8}P^8_8 = {12! \over 8!(12-8)!}8! = {12! \over (12-8)!} = {12! \over 4!} = 19958400

q.content: Eight committee members are meeting in a room that has twelve chairs. In how many ways can they sit in the chairs?
